name: 巨 ~Gigantify~
description:
This is a small Puzzle Platformer where you dynamically scaling through the game.
You can precisely move around, get blocked everywhere;
Or become giant but bulky, destroy obstacles with your body weight.
Chain the advantages of different sizes to clear the level!

Mechanics:
巨 (Gigantify):

This will make you big for 5 seconds.
You will have all sorts of power, but to go anywhere,
You'll have to build up speed beforehand.

Solid Brick:

It's solid. There is no way to break it.
There are some fake ones with the same texture though.

Breakable Brick:

If you are big, this can be broken.
Otherwise it will block you when you're small.

Spring:

When you're big, you can compress them;
If you are small and tough the compressed spring,
It will release and give you a huge amount of velocity.

There are 6 levels, each has 2 exits while 1 hidden somewhere.
Find each one of them for...nothing.
Have fun!
